heisigStory: Of all of nature's disasters, this kanji picks out two of the worst: floods and fires. To recall the disposition of the elements, think of nature's solution to nature's own problem: a great flood pouring down over a great forest fire.
koohiiStory1: What a disaster! First a FIRE, then on top of it came FLOODs.
koohiiStory2: Don´t know about Japan, but here in Australia, flooding rivers and bushfires are the most common natural disasters.
myStory: thảm hoạ. lụt lội và hoả hoạn
